alert.note: Alert for Polk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 11:57AM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Morrison, Mille Lacs, Kanabec and Benton Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
